languages.text: {n}Губы префекта сжимаются в тонкую нить, и на ее лице, кажется, впервые расцветает подлинная живая эмоция — священный гнев:{/n} "Я — последняя надежда вашего протектората на спасение из когтей анархии, безалаберщины и окончательного развала! Только через меня, и меня одну, спасется эта часть Империума, имевшая несчастье попасть в лапы тех, кем движет только жадность, азарт и эго!"

{n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"
languages.original_text: {n}Губы префекта сжимаются в тонкую нить, и на ее лице, кажется, впервые расцветает подлинная живая эмоция — священный гнев:{/n} "Я — последняя надежда вашего протектората на спасение из когтей анархии, безалаберщины и окончательного развала! Только через меня, и меня одну, спасется эта часть Империума, имевшая несчастье попасть в лапы тех, кем движет только жадность, азарт и эго!"

I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding one's own ego!"

I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin presst ihre Lippen zu einer schmalen Linie zusammen und zum ersten Mal scheint eine echte Emotion durch ihre Fassade zu brechen ... aufrichtige Wut.{/n} "Ich bin die letzte Hoffnung Eures Protektorats gegen das Schreckgespenst der Anarchie, der Verantwortungslosigkeit und der totalen Auflösung! Ich allein kann diesen Teil des Imperiums retten, der das Pech hatte, in die Hände derer zu fallen, deren einzige Motivationen Profit, Abenteuer und die Pflege ihrer eigenen Egos sind!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin presst ihre Lippen zu einer schmalen Linie zusammen und zum ersten Mal scheint eine echte Emotion durch ihre Fassade zu brechen ... aufrichtige Wut.{/n} "Ich bin die letzte Hoffnung Eures Protektorats gegen das Schreckgespenst der Anarchie, der Verantwortungslosigkeit und der totalen Auflösung! Ich allein kann diesen Teil des Imperiums retten, der das Pech hatte, in die Hände derer zu fallen, deren einzige Motivationen Profit, Abenteuer und die Pflege ihrer eigenen Egos sind!"

languages.text: {n}La préfète pince les lèvres. Il semble que la première véritable émotion qu'elle ait jamais montrée commence maintenant à transparaître : la fureur du juste.{/n} « Je suis le dernier espoir de votre protectorat qui est à deux doigts de se désagréger complètement, rongé par l'anarchie et l'irresponsabilité ! Moi seule suis capable de sauver ce territoire de l'Imperium qui a eu le malheur de tomber entre les mains d'individus motivés uniquement par le profit, les sensations fortes et la complaisance ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète pince les lèvres. Il semble que la première véritable émotion qu'elle ait jamais montrée commence maintenant à transparaître : la fureur du juste.{/n} « Je suis le dernier espoir de votre protectorat qui est à deux doigts de se désagréger complètement, rongé par l'anarchie et l'irresponsabilité ! Moi seule suis capable de sauver ce territoire de l'Imperium qui a eu le malheur de tomber entre les mains d'individus motivés uniquement par le profit, les sensations fortes et la complaisance ! »

languages.text: {n}行政官嘴唇紧紧地抿成了一条线，原本冷冰冰的面具被打碎了。这是她第一次爆发出真正的情感，她的话语义愤填膺。{/n}“只有我才能保护你的王朝，让它免受暴乱与失职所害，不至于落得分崩离析的下场！我是最后的希望！只有我才能拯救帝国的这部分疆土，将它从那些只知道寻求利益、刺激、自我满足的人手中拯救出来！”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官嘴唇紧紧地抿成了一条线，原本冷冰冰的面具被打碎了。这是她第一次爆发出真正的情感，她的话语义愤填膺。{/n}“只有我才能保护你的王朝，让它免受暴乱与失职所害，不至于落得分崩离析的下场！我是最后的希望！只有我才能拯救帝国的这部分疆土，将它从那些只知道寻求利益、刺激、自我满足的人手中拯救出来！”

languages.text: {n}La prefecta aprieta los labios, dejando que la primera emoción real que muestra atraviese su fingida impasibilidad. Está furiosa.{/n} «¡Soy la única esperanza de su protectorado contra la anarquía, la irresponsabilidad y la aniquilación total! ¡Solo yo puedo salvar esta parte del Imperium, que ha caído en manos de gente motivada solo por el lucro, las emociones y su propio ego!».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta aprieta los labios, dejando que la primera emoción real que muestra atraviese su fingida impasibilidad. Está furiosa.{/n} «¡Soy la única esperanza de su protectorado contra la anarquía, la irresponsabilidad y la aniquilación total! ¡Solo yo puedo salvar esta parte del Imperium, que ha caído en manos de gente motivada solo por el lucro, las emociones y su propio ego!».

languages.text: {n}総監の唇はギュッと結ばれ薄い線となり、彼女が初めて見せた本当の感情が、まさにそのうわべを突き破って現われる。それは本物の怒りだ。{/n}「私は、無政府状態、無責任、完全な崩壊に立ち向かう、この保護領の最後の希望です！私だけが、利益や刺激、肥大した自尊心しか求めぬ者たちの手に落ちた、この不運な帝国の一角を救えるのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}総監の唇はギュッと結ばれ薄い線となり、彼女が初めて見せた本当の感情が、まさにそのうわべを突き破って現われる。それは本物の怒りだ。{/n}「私は、無政府状態、無責任、完全な崩壊に立ち向かう、この保護領の最後の希望です！私だけが、利益や刺激、肥大した自尊心しか求めぬ者たちの手に落ちた、この不運な帝国の一角を救えるのです！」

languages.text: {n}Prefektin dudakları, ince bir çizgi hâline gelerek birleşiyor. Şimdiye kadar dışa vurduğu ilk gerçek duygu olan haklı öfke, maskesinin ardından sızmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ben anarşinin, sorumsuzluğun ve her anlamda bir çöküşün pençelerine karşı protektoranızın son umuduyum! İmparatorluk'un; tek motivasyonları kâr, hezeyan ve kendi benliklerini kamçılamak olanların eline düşme talihsizliğine uğramış bu kısmını yalnızca ben kurtarabilirim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips press together into a thin line, and it seems that the first real emotion she has ever shown is now breaking through her facade — righteous fury.{/n} "I am your protectorate's last hope against the jaws of anarchy, irresponsibility, and complete unravelling! I alone can save this part of the Imperium that had the misfortune of falling into the hands of those whose only motivations are profit, excitement, and feeding their own egos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefektin dudakları ince bir çizgi hâline gelerek birleşiyor ve şimdiye kadar dışa vurduğu ilk gerçek duygu olan haklı öfkenin, maskesinin ardından sızdığı görülüyor.{/n} "Ben anarşinin, sorumsuzluğun ve her anlamda bir çöküşün pençelerine karşı protektoranızın son umuduyum! İmparatorluk'un; tek motivasyonları kâr, hezeyan ve kendi benliklerini kamçılamak olanların eline düşme talihsizliğine uğramış bu kısmını yalnızca ben kurtarabilirim!"
